Joe Fiore, the head of the Windows Phone 7 team, joined Steve Ballmer on stage at the MWC and said, When apps run in the background, you risk draining your battery. Our implementation provides a battery-safe solution for third-party multitasking. In a demo, Fiore showed how this will work: pressing and holding on the smartphone's Back button will bring up a list of currently running software. More Changes Are Coming Fiore
